dublinCore.dc:title: HR 33 ENR: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to ensure that emergency services volunteers are not taken into account as employees under the shared responsibility requirements contained in the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Fourteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Tuesday, the sixth day of January, two thousand and fifteen
form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to ensure that emergency services volunteers are not taken into account as employees under the shared responsibility requirements contained in the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

section.text: The Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2015 (Public Law 113â€“164; 128 Stat. 1867) is amended by striking the date specified in section 106(3) and inserting March 6, 2015.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
